meanings.sent1: She insisted on having her favorite toy back.
meanings.sent2: He insisted that he could finish the project on time.
meanings.sent3: The cat insisted on being fed by meowing loudly.
meanings.sent4: The toddler insisted on wearing a superhero cape everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The teacher insisted on silence during the exam.

meanings.sent1: The witness insisted that he saw the suspect at the scene.
meanings.sent2: She insisted on her innocence despite the evidence.
meanings.sent3: The tree insisted on growing despite the harsh weather.
meanings.sent4: His principles insisted on honesty in all dealings.
meanings.sent5: The old clock insisted on ticking loudly in the quiet room.
